column4: Well my question is I have installed modem drivers and trying to connect it via gnome-ppp but failed to do so. but when i try using terminal by typing sudo wvdial its working fine but too many disconnections before successful connection to isp.

Well my question is I have installed modem drivers and trying to connect it via gnome-ppp but failed to do so. but when i try using terminal by typing sudo wvdial its working fine but too many disconnections before successful connection to isp
what should i need to do to fix this problem?
help me, im using hardy deron. but i want to fix my modem problem
how can i connect via gnome-ppp
is there any channel for proper help?
I'm already using net via dial up but i want to connect via gnome-ppp rather then connecting wvdial
every time i need to connect via wvdial by entering sudo wvdial command
but when i try via gnome-ppp it saying that permission denied
can i avoid the sudo wvdial?
tell me how can i always add it into boot?
kindly check out and resolve my problem, you will be highly appreciated
I'm not aware of linux commands thats why i offered you to find me how to add it to boot.
can any one help me out, every time i start internet i need to type sudo wvdial. but when i try using gnome-ppp it says you don't have permission can any body tell me how can i resolve this issue?
did you add yourself to the dip and dialout groups ?
